snippet: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said three companies that serviced and financed high-interest online loans had violated federal laws as well as state ones.
abstract: Consumer Financial Protection Bureau sues online loan servicer CashCall, two related companies and owner, J Paul Reddam, saying they serviced and financed high-interest online loans that violated federal laws as well as state ones.
lead_paragraph: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau said three companies that serviced and financed high-interest online loans had violated federal laws as well as state ones.

headline.main: Federal Consumer Agency Sues Over Online Loans
headline.print_headline: Federal Consumer Agency Sues Over Online Loans
